html.p: We all do things that can run counter to, oppose, or hinder our goals. What specifically are you doing or not doing instead of taking steps to reach your Improvement Goal?
html.blockquote: Example: Fred is an aspiring novelist. His goal is to "get better at integrating creative writing into my daily life" but something he does instead is "I surf the internet when I have sat down to write." Something he does not do instead is "I don't schedule writing time into my week."
html.p: Write your "Doing / Not Doing Instead" here.
